snippet: Long known as a training ground for European Union bureaucrats, the College of Europe faces challenges in its bid to produce well-rounded civil servants.
lead_paragraph: Long known as a training ground for European Union bureaucrats, the College of Europe faces challenges in its bid to produce well-rounded civil servants.

headline.seo: College of Europe Aims to Produce Well-Rounded Civil Servants
headline.main: School of the E.U. Elite Adapts to a Changing Climate
headline.print_headline: School of the E.U. Elite Adapts to a Changing Climate
